section.p: This problem is just a mathmatical problem. The speed how fast the two armies get close is (u+v), the sum of their speeds. Then the time they meet will be l/(u+v). The reporter is always running, so the time he runs is also l/(u+v). And the distance he runs will equals the speed multiply the time that is l/(u+v)*w. So when you read a group of (u,v,w,l), just output l/(u+v)*w.
